concept.title: Backup and restore in a high availability environment
concept.shortdesc: The backup and restore of a high availability (HA) environment needs to be a coordinated process between the servers in an HA pair.

conbody.p: The process of backing up and restoring an HA environment requires the use of a single backup file. For information about creating a secure backup of an HA environment, see . For information about restoring the HA environment, see .
